Title: Manhunt
Plot: The murder of a prominent lawyer leads Carrie and Al to reexamine a rape case that moved Manhattan thirteen years before. Soon, they realize that the case was not as clear cut as it was portrayed by the media, and an innocent man may have been wrongfully convicted.
GuestStars: Purva Bedi, Sean Cullen, Chris Chalk, Sepideh Moafi, Ben Cole, Adriane Lenox, Franky G
